title: Is the ‘Mega-Merger’ Really Going to Happen? Report: Jumbo-Visma Boss in Contact with UCI
content:
Belgian newspaper 'HLN' reports discussions with the UCI and key bike sponsors ahead of a fast-approaching October 15 WorldTour license deadline.

Read the full article at Is the ‘Mega-Merger’ Really Going to Happen? Report: Jumbo-Visma Boss in Contact with UCI on Velo.
author: ahood
